# streamDescription

**Instance Property**

The audio format properties of a stream of audio data.

## Declaration

```swift
var streamDescription: UnsafePointer<AudioStreamBasicDescription> { get }
```

## Discussion

Returns an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreAudioTypes/AudioStreamBasicDescription] that you use with lower-level audio APIs.
title: streamDescription
